Ingredients.1: 1 (1 pound) loaf French bread, cut into 1/2 inch pieces

Directions.2: Arrange French bread slices in a single layer on a large baking sheet. Broil in the preheated oven 1 to 2 minutes per side, until lightly toasted. Remove from heat.

Directions.3: In a medium bowl, mix mango and fresh basil.

Directions.4: Top each bread slice with equal amounts of the mango and basil mixture. Sprinkle with Romano cheese, adjusting the amount to taste.

Directions.5: Return topped bread to broiler. Broil 2 to 3 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and lightly browned. Serve hot.
